defmodule Blockytalky.UserCode do
  use Blockytalky.DSL
start do
   set(:item , 60)
  cue("hello")
  in_time(2) do
     set(:item , 64)
    cue("hello")

   end

end

defmotif "hello" do
  play_synth(get(:item),5)

end

end
